channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: California’s Vague ‘Hate Speech’ Bill Would Force Big Tech To Censor Mainstream Conservative Views
item.description: SB-771 threatens to turn digital platforms into ideological enforcers, punishing those who hold traditional, faith-based viewpoints.

item.title: Illegal Alien Who Ran Des Moines School District Had Long History Of Criminal Charges
item.description: In the throes of the DEI era the color of Roberts' skin was more compelling than this loaded weapons conviction.

item.title: Democrats Simply Refuse to Reckon with Leftist Political Violence
The High Costs of Forever QE
item.description: It amplifies the temptation to overspend in turbulent times.

item.title: Woke Elites Ignore the Obvious Solution to Crime
item.description: We’ve tried everything else. Maybe it’s time to try the thing that worked.

item.title: Is Google’s Apology for Censorship Sincere?
item.description: ‘The government made us do it’ should not suffice to avoid accountability, nor should it instantly restore the public trust so blatantly betrayed.

item.title: Why Calling Charlie Kirk A Martyr Matters
item.description: Charlie Kirk’s murder was not simply the death of a man, but a spiritual assault in a spiritual war between Good and Evil.

item.title: Rep. Wesley Hunt enters bitter GOP Senate primary in Texas, challenging Sen. John Cornyn
item.description: Rep. Wesley Hunt said Monday he will enter the Republican primary for a U.S. Senate seat in Texas.

item.title: Judge issues new order blocking Trump from bringing out-of-state troops to Oregon
item.description: A federal judge issued a new restraining order late Sunday barring the Trump administration from deploying other states' National Guard troops to Port...

item.title: Jack Ciattarelli for New Jersey Governor
item.description: The Garden State has gotten unified Democratic governance good and hard over the last decade. It deserves something better.

item.title: Federal judge temporarily blocks Trump administration from sending National Guard troops to Oregon
item.description: A federal judge late Sunday temporarily blocked the Trump administration from deploying any National Guard units to Oregon at all, after a legal whirl...

item.title: D.C. Council member Brooke Pinto running to succeed D.C. Delegate Eleanor Holmes Norton
item.description: D.C. Council member Brooke Pinto announced Monday that she is running to succeed D.C. Delegate Eleanor Holmes Norton, the District's longtime nonvotin...

item.title: Trump promises pay raises for military coming, despite government shutdown
item.description: President Trump said the government shutdown will not hinder the pay raises he is seeking for every member of the U.S. military. Celebrating the Navy'...

item.title: DOJ Opens Investigation Into Antifa-Indulging Portland Police
item.description: The probe follows the arrest of a conservative journalist who says he was taken into custody after being attacked by Antifa thugs.

item.title: Biden Judge Gives Would-Be Kavanaugh Assassin Light Sentence As Left-Wing Violence Skyrockets
item.description: Prosecutors wanted Boardman to sentence Roske to 'no fewer than 30 years to life imprisonment' for his plot against Kavanaugh.
